item.description:
Hello Everyone!

ONCE AGAIN........

I CHANGED THE DATE OF THIS MEETUP. I WAS GETTING FEEDBACK THAT FROM MEMBERS WHO WANTED TO JOIN BUT COULDN'T BECAUSE OF EASTER. THANK YOU FOR YOUR PATIENCE. I'M HOPING TO GET A LOT OF PEOPLE TO JOIN FOR THIS WEEKEND!

One of our members suggested this Austrian restaurant in Cheshire. After doing a little bit of research (and trusting the opinion of our trusty member), I think it's finally time to check this place out! It's a little bit of a hike from West Hartford, which is why I chose Saturday evening instead of Friday.

Hope to see you all there! Please see details below...

Cammy

Watch Factory Restaurant
122 Elm Street,
Cheshire, CT 06410
Phone: 203-271-1717

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: Watch Factory Restaurant
